Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: District based of FEMA FIRM maps. ADUs must be within existing single family homes and may not exceed 50% of that home's market value. Any use allowed in the underlying district requiring new construction is subject to conditional use review.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Adaptive re-use of ag structures is particularly encouraged and may result in approval of conditional uses not otherwise permitted in this district. Mobile home parks are subject to conditional use approval.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: Development is limited by soil suitability for on-site sewage disposal. Lot frontage may be measured on the road or the lakeshore.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: The requirements of this overlay district apply only to conditional uses and are intended to preserve historic mixed use character along Route 22A and prevent strip development.

column166: Parking Spaces Add'l to Main Unit
column183: This district is intended to preserve open space for recreation within walking distance of the Village.
